definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: The nanocrystalline TiO2 film is sensitized by dyestuff with dip and absorption.
sentences.chinese: 採用浸漬吸附法對納米晶二氧化鈦薄膜進行染料敏化。

sentences.english: Lithopone has mostly been replaced by titanium dioxide which is more durable, but it is much cheaper.
sentences.chinese: 立德粉有大多被二氧化鈦取代，但它廉價得多。

sentences.english: Nanometer titanium dioxide can be made by gas-phase method and liquid-phase method.
sentences.chinese: 納米二氧化鈦的製備方法主要有氣相法和液相法。

sentences.english: The basic mechanism of titanium dioxide photocatalytic water-splitting for hydrogen production is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 簡單介紹了二氧化鈦光催化分解水制氫的基本原理。

sentences.english: Nanosized titanium dioxide is one of photocatalysts which is followed with great interest at present.
sentences.chinese: 納米二氧化鈦是目前最受人們關注的光催化劑之一。

sentences.english: The recent progresses of codoped titania photocatalyst are reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 綜述了近年來共摻雜二氧化鈦光催化劑的研究進展。

sentences.english: The oxidation of waste PS is researched via high temperature liquid-phase process.
sentences.chinese: 納米二氧化鈦的製備方法主要有氣相法和液相法。

sentences.english: Nearly all white paint is white because of the titanium dioxide found in the ore.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎所有白色塗料的白色都是源於礦石中的二氧化鈦。

sentences.english: The optical band gap between nano-TiO 2 energy band and conduction band is3.
sentences.chinese: 納米二氧化鈦能帶和導帶之間的帶隙能爲3。

sentences.english: I just swapped in titanium dioxide instead.
sentences.chinese: 在我的反應中，鐵的氧化物換作二氧化鈦。

sentences.english: It involves the progress of using nanometer titania as material of chemical at last.
sentences.chinese: 最後論述了納米二氧化鈦作化工材料的應用進展。

sentences.english: The major production methods of titanium oxide are sulfate method and chlorinate method.
sentences.chinese: 二氧化鈦的生產方法主要分爲硫酸法和氯化法兩種。

sentences.english: Two chemical qualities make TiO2 an all-purpose cleaner.
sentences.chinese: 兩種化學性質使得二氧化鈦成爲通用的清潔劑。

sentences.english: A titanium based welding flux that includes titanium dioxide and a moisture resistant agent.
sentences.chinese: 本發明提供一種鈦基焊劑，其包括二氧化鈦和防潮劑。

sentences.english: The recent progress in research on nitrogen- doped TiO2 is reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了二氧化鈦非金屬氮摻雜改性的研究進展。
